articles.title: We Will Finally Settle Accounts with Park Geun Hye Group: NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
We Will Finally Settle Accounts with Park Geun Hye Group: NDC of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK Tuesday released a crucial report in which it declared it would finally settle accounts with the vicious Park Geun Hye group of hooligans.
					 The Park Geun Hye group on Monday let idiot-like spokesman of the puppet Ministry of Defense Kim Min Sok make an official appearance to term the just demand made by the inspection group of the NDC of the DPRK again for clarifying the story about the "north's involvement" in the drone case and making a joint investigation into it a far-fetched assertion that makes a profound confusion of the right and wrong.
					
					 Kim Min Sok shouted hoarse to dare slander the DPRK as a "country that can hardly be called a country" and "a country bereft of human rights and freedom". He went the lengths of talking such rubbish that "it is a country which should disappear at an early date".
					
					 The crucial report of the NDC of the DPRK denounced this as an intolerable challenge to the DPRK and the height of confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized south Korea as a normal sovereign state as its name the "Republic of Korea" is a copy of the name of the country that existed in the closing period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty which was on the decline being chopped to pieces at the hands of big powers because of its flunkeyism and treachery, the report said, and went on:
					
					 The puppet forces of south Korea, a colony where they have the prerogative over the army, a basic criteria of a sovereign state, usurped by the U.S. and find themselves in such a poor position in which they have to eat without complaint beef infected with mad cow disease offered by the U.S. and suffer from high fever being caught by a cold if the U.S. makes a cough.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, who claims to be "president", has to stammer out American English when she is in the U.S. to play the coquette with her American master. Only then can she be regarded as a faithful dog and servant. This is the wretched plight of south Korea.
					
					 That's why we have long regarded south Korea as a group of puppets and colonial servants who are steeped in dependence on outsiders and treachery to the marrow of their bones. 
					
					 Stressing that the DPRK can never overlook the fact that such guys dared point an accusing finger at the DPRK, the most dignified country in the world, the crucial report continued:
					
					 It is also pitiful to see the south Korean puppet forces making a false show of power after pinning their hope on their U.S. master's such common war hardware as assault fighters, aircraft carriers and guided missiles.
					
					 The DPRK doesn't hide that it possesses strike means more powerful than all the latest war hardware noisily advertised by the U.S.
					
					 It is a resolution already made by the DPRK to force the enemies to pay a dear price whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of such reckless remarks made by Kim as he termed the DPRK "a country which should disappear as early as possible", unaware of such a reality.
					
					 Such reckless remarks have never been made in the distress-torn history of national division.
					
					 What the Park group uttered this time cannot be construed otherwise than a total denial of compatriots in the north, an undisguised revelation of its wild ambition to achieve the "unification by absorption" and a declaration of all-out confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 The baneful consequences to be entailed by these reckless outbursts can be neither retrieved nor put under control.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK and the mindset of all other Koreans are strongly calling for wiping the Park group out of this land as it didn't hesitate to perpetrate thrice-cursed treason.
					
					 The Park group will have to keenly feel what miserable consequences it will face for its vitriol.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Slams Reckless Outbursts of Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Defense
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Slams Reckless Outbursts of Spokesman for S. Korean Ministry of Defense
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released a statement on Tuesday in denunciation of the anti-DPRK invectives let loose by the spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense.
					 It said: On Monday spokesman for the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense called Kim Min Sok, an idiot, at a regular news briefing went the lengths of daring defame the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK, not content with pulling up it again over the "case of drones from the north" recently cooked up by the south Korean regime. This was nothing but a ridiculous charade.
					
					 The statement ridiculed what he uttered as nothing but the last-ditch effort as it only brought to light the wretched plight of the Park regime desperately working to tide over its worsening ruling crisis.
					
					 The Park group is now finding itself in the worst ruling crisis due to the ferry disaster unprecedented in history, etc., the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Thrown into extreme fear and uneasiness, Park and her yes-men are desperately pulling up the DPRK like a rabid dog in a bid to get rid of their pretty fix. They seem to ignite even a war. However, this is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggot on their back.
					
					 The U.S. styling itself the world's only superpower though it is acting boss of hooligans dares not provoke the DPRK while regarding the latter as a thorn in its flesh. But the hordes of bumpkins led by country woman Park dares point an accusing finger at the DPRK. This has become a big laughing stock of the world.
					
					 Kim Min Sok talked such rubbish that the "country should no longer exist" but people are comparing the DPRK which is dashing by leaps and bounds toward an ideal country where all people lead luxury under socialism thanks to the great politics of loving care for the people and the rising generations with south Korea which has turned into a mourner's house after being reduced to a hell cursed by the people. They are quite clear which "country" should exist and which regime should disappear.
					
					 Idiots like Kim Min Sok should clearly understand that Chongwadae of south Korea and its colonial system will have to disappear in face of strikes to be entailed by their reckless tongue wagging.
					
					 Park should immediately and severely punish Kim Min Sok and his manipulators who dared point an accusing finger at the DPRK, if she wants to prolong her remaining days even a bit.
					
					 Otherwise, Chongwadae, to say nothing of the puppet Ministry of Defense, will never be able to go scot-free but be forced to pay a very high price.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets SWAPO Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets SWAPO Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the South West Africa People's Organization of Namibia headed by Secretary General Nangolo Mbumba which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 The secretary general expressed his tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un who extended invariable support and solidarity to the Namibian people in their struggle and made sure that the friendly relations between the two countries grew stronger.
					
					 He said that his delegation came to the DPRK to boost the friendly relations between the two parties and countries, adding the Republic of Namibia sets store by the comradely solidarity with the DPRK.
					
					 He sincerely wished the Korean people successes in their drive for the economic development and the earliest possible reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Turkish Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Turkish Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Turkish Ambassador to the DPRK Arslan Hakan OKCAL at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Workers' Hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Workers' Hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials including Kim Yong Nam and officials of the Workers' Party of Korea, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the newly-built Workers' Hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill on Tuesday.
					 The visitors laid bouquets before a mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and made a bow to them.
					
					 They were briefed on the fact that the hostel was successfully built to meet the needs of modern architectural beauty and requirements of the times.
					
					 The visitors went round the hostel that turned into a fashionable building and a palace for the ordinary workers on the principle of ensuring conveniences and architectural beauty first.
					
					 They were moved to looked round bedrooms, baths, shop, library, dining hall, park and other places.

articles.title: China's Organization Offers DPRK Aid Materials
articles.content:
China's Organization Offers DPRK Aid Materials
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The China Disabled Persons' Federation offered aid materials to the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled.
					 A donation ceremony was held here on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, officials concerned and members of the delegation of the China Disabled Persons' Federation headed by Vice President Cheng Kai on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, its participators enjoyed a performance given by disabled persons' art group.

articles.title: National Industrial Art Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
National Industrial Art Exhibition Closes
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The National Industrial Art Exhibition closed with due ceremony Tuesday at the State Industrial Art Exhibition House. It was opened to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The exhibition was visited by a lot of officials of ministries, national institutions, officials and creators in the field of the industrial art from across the country, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 Present at its closing ceremony were officials concerned, creators, teachers and students in the field of the industrial art in various parts of the country and amateurs of industrial art.
					
					 At the ceremony certificates, medals and prizes were conferred upon the industrial art studio of the Ministry of Machine Industry, the industrial art studio of North Hamgyong Province and various other units here and in local provinces and individuals that proved successful.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice premier of the Cabinet, underscored the need to create more peculiar and valuable designs of various kinds which reflect the aspiration and wishes of Koreans and would be impeccable in any aspect.

articles.title: SWAPO Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
SWAPO Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The South West Africa People's Organization (SWAPO) of Namibia led by Secretary General Nangolo Mbumba visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The members of the delegation visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where historical data and relics dealing with the revolutionary activities of the President and the members of the Mangyongdae family are on display.
					
					 They looked round with keen interest the historic relics, being briefed on the story about the time-honored home.
					
					 They visited the revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 After the visit, the secretary general made the following entry in the visitor's book: We pay tribute to the leaders of the DPRK who led the struggle of the Korean people to victory. The Namibian revolutionaries extend greetings to all the fighters of the DPRK and their descendents. The Korean revolution will always emerge victorious. Glory to the heroic Korean people.
					
					 The guests also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Museum, Okryu Children's Hospital, Munsu Water Park and several other places.

articles.title: DWUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DWUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) headed by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, came back home Tuesday after taking part in a meeting of  the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation held in Moscow and visiting Russia and Belarus.

articles.title: 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships to Be Held in DPRK
articles.content:
19th World Taekwon-Do Championships to Be Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea will host the 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships in September Juche 104 (2015).
					 It was decided at the general assembly of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF) held in Sofia, Bulgaria in July 2013.
					
					 An organizing committee has been already inaugurated for the successful holding of the championships in Pyongyang.
					
					 Its Chairman Cha Hui Rim, who is chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, told KCNA that the organizing committee would do its best to make the championships a significant occasion conducive to strengthening the ITF and promoting the solidarity among Taekwon-Do players in the world.

articles.title: Women's Premier Soccer Finals of Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Held
articles.content:
Women's Premier Soccer Finals of Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Held
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The second round of women's premier soccer matches of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games came to a close.
					 A final match was played by the April 25 Team and the Sobaeksu Team at the Sosan Football Stadium on Tuesday.
					
					 The April 25 Team trounced its rival 7:5.
					
					 Prior to the finals there was a match between the Ponghwasan Team and the Mangyongbong Team.
					
					 The Ponghwasan Team beat its rival 3:2.
					
					 The April 25 Team came first in team standing and the Sobaeksu and Mangyongbong teams took the second and third places.

articles.title: Service School Opens at Pyongyang University of Commerce
articles.content:
Service School Opens at Pyongyang University of Commerce
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A service school was established at Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce.
					 Its opening ceremony took place on April 28.
					
					 The school, with two- or three-year education systems, is aimed to train skillful service workers.
					
					 It has four study courses--hotel administration, hotel service, gastrology and welfare service. It is also putting efforts on the education in socio-politics and general basic subjects.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from China Disabled Persons' Federation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from China Disabled Persons' Federation
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the China Disabled Persons' Federation.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Cheng Kai, vice president of the federation who is heading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Efforts Devoted to Farming in DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Efforts Devoted to Farming in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Rice-transplanting now goes on in co-op farms of the DPRK.
					 With this rice-transplanting season, the Korean people recall the devoted efforts made by President Kim Il Sung to realize the Juche method of farming.
					
					 It was a sleet day of February Juche 62 (1973) when the President visited a cooperative farm in Samsok District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Going round farm fields, he acquainted himself in detail with the reasons why last year's farming came to failure.
					
					 One of the main factors was disobedience to the requirements of the Juche farming method, which led to the failure to grow healthy rice-seedlings, he pointed out, stressing the need to strictly abide by the scientific and technological principles in preparing rice seedbeds and sowing.
					
					 Next day, he convened an enlarged meeting of the Executive Committee of the Pyongyang City Party Committee to awake the officials to the scientific principles to be observed in setting the right soil for rice seedbed and growing rice-seedlings.
					
					 In this way Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had worked heart and soul for the country's farming to bring greater happiness to the people.

articles.title: Rice-transplanting Starts in Countryside of DPRK
articles.content:
Rice-transplanting Starts in Countryside of DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Rice-transplanting began in almost rural areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 The co-op farms across the country pay big efforts to ensuring the rice-transplantation on a scientific basis according to climate and soil conditions.
					
					 And they work hard for the full-capacity operation of tractors and rice-transplanting machines to carry on the daily rice-transplanting quota as scheduled.
					
					 Efforts are also given to ensuring the smooth progress of such farming processes as drawing water into rice paddies.

articles.title: Medium Waves Therapy for Liver Cancer Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Medium Waves Therapy for Liver Cancer Established in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A therapy for hepatoma by medium waves has been recently established in the health service of the DPRK.
					 Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University introduced this therapy in treating a hepatoma of less than 3 centimeters, having 96 percent efficacy.
					
					 Mun Yon Hwa, a section chief of the tumor research room at the hospital, told KCNA:
					
					 The therapy is carried out by a high-tech device with capacity of producing 1.5 MHz of medium waves.
					
					 According to its application in clinical practices, the treatment device ensured 99 percent of recovery rate among cases with hepatoma when it was early detected within one year, 86 percent within three years and 64 percent within five years.
					
					 It makes it possible to remove cancer cell totally through one or two operation by infiltrating its treatment electrode into tumor tissue.
					
					 This device produces high efficacy in treatment of tumor tissue and gives no effect on other tissues.
					
					 At present, a research is being intensified to further improve its performance and extend the sphere of its application.

articles.title: Striking Contrast between North and South of Korea: News Analyst
articles.content:
Striking Contrast between North and South of Korea: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The first batch of campers began on May 10 their camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp that was newly remodeled as a palace for the children rare to be found in any other parts of the world.
					 Children are greatly excited and delighted to enjoy a happy camping, looking round the international friendship children's hall, outdoor playground, gym, indoor swimming pool, outdoor water park, outdoor archery ground, aquarium, birds' cages and an exhibition room of stuffed animals in the camp associated with the Workers' Party of Korea's profound love for the rising generation. They said they felt as if they were entering a deluxe hotel and a wonderland. Happy laughter is heard from those facilities.
					
					 That is why they sing the song "We are the happiest in the world." 
					
					 But the fate of children in south Korea is quite different from this.
					
					 Ferry Sewol sank, claiming lives of many teenagers. The sky above south Korea is, therefore, overcast with dark clouds. The screams made by so many children before breathing their last in vast sea seem to ring loud still now. 
					
					 The public is becoming increasingly critical of the unpopular rule of the Park Geun Hye group which caused such tragedy.
					
					 But the group is keen on evading the responsibility for the disaster. We would like to query has ever there been such a case in which hundreds of children were buried at the sea all at the same time.
					
					 Park who had never been called mum does not seem to care for children.
					
					 Deplorable, indeed, is Park's outlook on children as she claims to be "president" of south Korea.
					
					 The cold-blooded woman who can hardly be called woman caused the group deaths of children, far from protecting children who should be of primary concern in the field of human rights.
					
					 Quite contrary to this, children in the DPRK are enjoying themselves in the fascinating camp. Park had better keep her mouth shut. If she wants to say anything, she should admit the society in the DPRK as a heaven while that in south Korea as a hell.
					
					 A saying goes future is reflected in the eyes of children. Without children there can never be future.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the society in the DPRK is like a beautiful flower garden in which children are growing up under the profound loving care of the Party for the rising generation whereas south Korea is a tundra of human rights.

articles.title: DPRK's Famous Writer Chon Se Bong
articles.content:
DPRK's Famous Writer Chon Se Bong
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Chon Se Bong (1915-1986) was one of the famous writers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In his life time Chon, a winner of Order of Kim Il Sung and Kim Il Sung Prize, had created many literary works of national treasure. He was awarded a literary prize of the Afro-Asian writers' association.
					
					 He worked as a member of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, a member of the Standing Committee of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly (at that time) and chairman of the C.C., Writers Union of Korea.
					
					 Born into a tenant's family in Kowon County, South Hamgyong Province, he could not but leave school halfway and serve as a farmhand and a jobber for economic distress. Anyhow, he had special taste for literature.
					
					 It was under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that his ardent wish for a writer was realized.
					
					 Chon took the lead in creating the revolutionary literature.
					
					 His typical works include full-length novels "The Dawn of the Revolution", "The Galaxy" and "Korea in Spring" (posthumous work) from the cycle of novels "Immortal History" and Parts 1 and 2 of the cycle of novels "On the Road of Loyalty".
					
					 His creation speed was admirable and he never passed six months to write even a full-length novel. For instance, a full-length novel "Large River Flows" with 2 000 sheets of manuscript was written in no less than 60 days.
					
					 When he created "A New Spring in Sokgaeul" (parts 1, 2, 3), a novel very popular among the Korean people, he presented 200 sheets of manuscript a day.
					
					 In his works Chon depicted characters and life of persons as well as their inner mental state vividly and in a deep-going way.
					
					 "40 Years of Writer's Life", a full-length note written by him in his closing days, still serves as a good textbook for writers and literary fans.
					
					 His remains are kept at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Will Inevitably Sink: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Will Inevitably Sink: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- 28 days have passed since the south Korean ferry Sewol sank. 
					 During the period the world witnessed the deplorable reality in which more than 300 children were buried at the bottom of the sea as the Park Geun Hye regime saved none of them. 
					
					 The inside of the hull collapsed as the ferry remained under water for nearly one month and despair is running high. The cries of those bereaved families who attempt to commit suicide to join their dead children and wailing of other parents are heard not only from Phaengmok Port but also from other parts of south Korea. 
					
					 The ferry Sewol tragedy will be followed by other disasters in south Korea. 
					
					 Everybody in south Korea is suffering from a nightmare under the rule of Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 All the south Koreans including schoolchildren cannot sleep in peace as south Korea is threatened with ceaseless disasters similar to the sinking of the ferry Sewol. 
					
					 The disaster of the ferry Sewol shows the real picture of the corrupt and ailing society under the misrule of Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 Had the south Korean authorities taken proper measures to rescue victims from the very moment of the accident, they would have minimized the casualties and shortened the time for rescue operation. 
					
					 The despicable nature of the corrupt south Korean society was brought to light. The captain was the first to leave the ferry and the "president" did not make any proper apology for the huge disaster. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye held a meeting of senior secretaries of Chongwadae a few days after the disaster but she was busy shifting the blame for the accident onto the inferiors, talking about "system for dealing with crisis". She branded the assertion that the sinking of the ferry Sewol was caused by the rapid change of route due to war drills as a wild rumor. She also blustered it was a "sinister intention" to spark a social chaos and cried out for pursuing those who spread such rumor to the last so that they be "held accountable for it." 
					
					 She behaved so recklessly as to invite the U.S. president to tour south Korea which turned into a veritable mourner's house and host a banquet for him, far from making much effort for rescue operation. 
					
					 The puppet authorities and public officials went round the scene of the rescue operation, copying the practice of their master. However, they attempted to have a photo taken before the list of the victims, utterly indifferent to the sorrow of the bereaved families. They let loose such invectives against the bereaved families and people holding them responsible for the accident, claiming that their demand "is politically motivated and they are "uncivilized people".
					
					  The ferry Sewol disaster was a product of the unpopular rule of Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 The dignity and political rights of south Koreans are now trampled down and they are deprived of even elementary right to existence under the fascist rule of the conservative forces. 
					
					 The social evils of the rich getting ever richer and the poor getting ever poorer have become serious and the living of inhabitants is in distress in south Korea. 
					
					 Education has been commercialized to be a lever for profiteers' money-making and a lot of university students are saddled with huge debts due to the snowballing registration fees. Streets and lanes are flooded with the unemployed and the number of those who commit suicide due to abject destitution is on the annual increase. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Intelligence Service, military, prosecution, police and other power bodies and the right-wing conservative media have reduced the south Korean society to a huge prison without bars and tundra of democracy. 
					
					 Not only south Korean media but also foreign media, describing the tragic reality of south Korea, claim that "an era of barbarians has come and the Park Geun Hye regime is leading south Korea to the era of dictatorship." 
					
					 The reality of south Korea where the ruling crisis is evermore deepening after the ferry Sewol disaster goes to prove the inevitable doom of the group of traitors. 
					
					 The sinking of the Park regime is the inevitability of history.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Posing Nuclear Threat to World
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Posing Nuclear Threat to World 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary brands the U.S. as the arch criminal posing a nuclear threat to the world.
					 According to a recent disclosure made by a high-ranking officer of the U.S. Navy, it decided to additionally introduce ten high-performance nuclear subs of "Virginia" class till 2018. To this end the U.S. is expected to spend 17.6 billion US dollars, the biggest contract in its history.
					
					 The U.S. is planning to outlay 60 billion U.S. dollars in the modernization of nuclear weapons for over 20 years, even according to the data available.
					
					 According to the report of a U.S. social body, the above-said amount of money is just the tip of the iceberg of the funds that the U.S. is going to spend to bolster up its nuclear force for decades to come and billions of U.S. dollars are required for building new facilities for making nukes and the same amount of dollars for the development of subs, etc.
					
					 This clearly proves how persistently the U.S. is working to realize its wild ambition to put the world under its domination, obsessed with the doctrine that nuclear weapons are almighty.
					
					 It is the invariable strategy of the U.S. to realize its scenario to put the world under its domination on the basis of its military edge.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the U.S. modernization of its nuclear weapons is openly being carried out under the signboard of "nuclear disarmament".
					
					 However, such trick will not work in such a bright world.
					
					 The U.S. persistent efforts to modernize its nukes behind the curtain of "nuclear disarmament" would only entail the baneful consequences of escalating the nuclear arms race worldwide.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by such a reckless move and halt it at once.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Its Exercise of Right to Collective Self-Defense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japan against Its Exercise of Right to Collective Self-Defense
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The chief secretary of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan during his recent trip to the U.S. gave a lecture in Washington at which he asserted that Japan's exercise of  its right to collective self-defense would lead to bolstering up deterrence in the Asia-Pacific and it is in line with the U.S. strategy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This reveals the Japanese reactionaries' wild ambition to rush headlong into overseas expansion and reinvasion, backed by the U.S.
					
					 What the chief secretary uttered is no more than sheer sophism painting a wrong picture of the crisis in the region and its solution, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 In case Japan is allowed to exercise its right to collective self-defense, the Asia-Pacific region may find itself in a state of more horrible war than it did in the first half of the last century.
					
					 The U.S. okayed the Japanese ruling quarters' moves to allow the exercise of the right to collective self-defense.
					
					 Japan's exercise of the right to collective self-defense may conform with the U.S. strategy but it is a very dangerous action harmful to the Asia-Pacific region. Japan requires it for launching overseas expansion and reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese authorities, however, should bear in mind that both times and equilibrium of forces have changed.
					
					  Japan had better always bear in mind that if it makes a desperate bid to revive militarism with the U.S backing, it would become the first to face deadly strikes in contingency.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Doctrine
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Park Geun Hye's Doctrine
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye's "doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" is an unpardonable anti-reunification theory as it seriously misinterprets and denies the essence and nature of the issue of national reunification and chills the desire of the compatriots for independent reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on: Park attaches the watchword "gaining a great opportunity" liked by lazybones only to the sacred word "unification." This is an intolerable mockery of the compatriots who have devoted their soul to the sacred struggle for the national reunification.
					
					 "The doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" is based on the theory of money being almighty as it makes reunification subject to an economic affair. It is, therefore, a heinous anti-reunification theory that tarnishes the cause of national reunification for achieving national sovereignty.
					
					 Such a harmful anti-reunification doctrine can be advanced only by the Park Geun Hye regime keen on inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen, bereft of any proper view of national reunification.
					
					 The puppet forces are talkative about "achieving peace", "increasing humanitarian aid", "recovering homogeneity" and the like for "laying the foundation of the reunification era," but they say nothing about the promotion of the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					 They only let loose reckless remarks inciting confrontation with compatriots such as "the north's dismantlement of its nukes".
					
					 As the above-said doctrine calls for viewing the reunification issue with a trader's way of thinking, it only brings the baneful consequences of spreading a negative view on reunification in the south Korean society.
					
					 It is little different from the crimes the Lee Myung Bak regime committed by secretly fanning up the anti-reunification atmosphere among the south Korean people and blocking the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south, talking about "funds for unification", "the unification jar" and the like.
					
					 Park should talk about the June 15 reunification era which paved the way for promoting the reconciliation and unity of the nation and opened up a bright prospect of independent reunification and peace and prosperity before touting the said doctrine.
					
					 It is inevitable for Park's anti-national doctrine to be thrown into the dust-bin of history, cursed and denounced by the whole nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Censured
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a commentary on May 9 denouncing the puppet chief executive for trying to calm down the anti-"government" sentiment running high due to the ferry Sewol sinking accident, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 The commentary recalled that Park Geun Hye held an emergency meeting for measures for people's living on the same day with the rich and those in authority attending.
					
					 It accused Park of terming people enraged at the ferry sinking disaster a disturbing and seditious force having bad influence on economy.
					
					 This is aimed to calm down the highly running public criticism of her with such deceptive words as "measures for people's living" as she regards it hard to quiet people's discontent and bar support rate for her from falling only by putting public opinion under control, it said.
					
					 In the long run, Park only discussed how to make the ferry sinking disaster not to have an influence on her rule and money-making, it noted, adding that is such a "president" necessary?

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Unethical Atrocities
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Their Unethical Atrocities 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea made public a statement on May 9 condemning the puppet authorities for their unethical atrocities.
					 The statement said that the authorities prodded KBS and other major broadcasting services to air programs about the ferry Sewol sinking accident in favor of the regime.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The news director of KBS, in particular, instructed its announcers not to put on black clothes as the ferry sinking accident is an "ordinary traffic accident." He went the length of making reckless remarks that there is no need to hear all what the families of those missing say, lashing the bereaved families into fury.
					
					 A spokesman for Chongwadae in a press conference talked about "pure bereaved families", adding that the bereaved families have any political purpose. His attitude revealed that he regarded as a "political intention" the people's resentment at the regime's ridiculous counteraction which was shown in the course of bridging over the accident.
					
					 The "government" responsible for people's safety insulted the demand of the bereaved families as a "political intention". It is little different from rubbing salt into the wounds of the people and bereaved families.
					
					 Chongwadae should not calm the people's resentment and mislead the situation but stop evading its responsibility for the accident through media put under its control and dismiss the news director of KBS, the statement noted, urging Park Geun Hye to make a direct apology before the bereaved families.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Blocking Events for Mourning over Death of Passengers of Ferry
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Blocking Events for Mourning over Death of Passengers of Ferry 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean youth solidarity on May 9 issued a statement in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' action of  blocking citizens' events honoring the memory of the victims of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 The bereaved families of the victims and other people of south Korea are staging actions against the incompetent regime.
					
					 The authorities instructed the police to stop the bereaved families and other citizens from going to Chongwadae for the mere reason that they were wearing funeral garments, and made no scruple of stopping young people who look like students.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is wholly to blame for the recent disaster, the statement said, adding people are greatly stunned by the inhumane attitude of the regime.
					
					 Noting that the youth can never remain a passive onlooker to the action of the regime which tells only lies, not making any step to rescue those missing, the statement expressed the determination to stage candlelight protests across south Korea in hearty response to the calls of the bereaved families.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Protest against Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Protest against Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. staged demos in 38 cities including Washington, New York and Los Angeles on May 10 in denunciation of the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea which caused the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, according to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 The demonstrators blamed Park Geun Hye regime for the ferry sinking accident, asserting that overseas Koreans' resentment at her is running high.
					
					 They noted that south Korean progressive forces are strongly demanding the immediate resignation of the present regime, saying a tragedy worse than the ferry sinking disaster would be entailed by the regime.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime was sunken with the ferry Sewol, they stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Benin
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Benin 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- We will form the Benin national remembrance committee to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and hold colorful events in praise of the peerlessly great man. 
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on May 8. 
					
					 The joint statement went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history, holding aloft the banner of independence. 
					
					 He was a prominent leader, peerless patriot and great revolutionary who glorified the 20th century as an era of victory of the cause of independence against imperialism and socialist cause, enjoying absolute support and trust from the Korean people and other progressives of the world for his outstanding idea, leadership and noble virtues. 
					
					 The 20th century was a century which shined with his immortal exploits and personality as a great man both in name and reality. 
					
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea fully support the appeal sent by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea to the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in different countries in the run-up to the 20th anniversary of demise of the President. 
					
					 We will extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of the country true to the behests of the President and leader Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party, Organization Denounce U.S. Crimes against Korean Nation
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party, Organization Denounce U.S. Crimes against Korean Nation 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian political party and organization bitterly denounced the U.S. unethical crimes against the Korean nation unprecedented in history. 
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea said in a joint statement on May 8:
					
					 The United States has committed such unethical crimes against the Korean nation as wantonly violating its sovereignty and human rights through all sorts of aggression, plunder and murder for more than a hundred years. 
					
					 The U.S. is imposing terrible disasters such as war and human rights abuses upon other countries and nations in different parts of the world including Korea. 
					
					 However, such crimes of the U.S. are not censured at the United Nations. 
					
					 The world progressives should become vocal cursing and condemning the U.S., the root cause of all disasters. 
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a statement on the same day:
					
					 Not only the Peruvian people but also other world people denounce the human rights abuses perpetrated by the U.S. against the Korean nation for centuries. 
					
					 The U.S. blockade against the DPRK is also a human rights abuse against the Korean people. 
					
					 The U.S. should make an apology to the Korean nation for its past crimes and stop at once its moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: CDN de RPDC rechaza chisme del portavoz de Ministerio de Defensa Nacional de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CDN de RPDC rechaza chisme del portavoz de Ministerio de Defensa Nacional de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 13 una informacion importante para declarar que se rendiran las cuentas finales con los compinches bribones de Park Geun-hye.
					Por encargo de la banda de Park, el imbecil portavoz del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Kim Min Sok, comparecio el dia 12 en un lugar publico y censuro como opinion ilogica de "bandido" el justo criterio del grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC que desmintio el rumor de "el incidente de drones es obra del Norte de Corea" y exigio nuevamente la investigacion conjunta.
					
					Al cabo de ofender a la RPDC como "pais que no lo es" y "pais sin derechos humanos ni libertad", ese tipejo chismeo que "ella es el pais que debe ser eliminado cuanto antes".
					
					En su informacion, el CDN de la RPDC lo califico como imperdonable desafio contra la RPDC y climax de la confrontacion fratricida y prosiguio:
					
					La RPDC no ha reconocido nunca como pais normal con aspectos de Estado soberano al Sur de Corea que se llama la "Republica de Corea" imitando el nombre de la etapa final de la dinastia feudal de Joson que se ha arruinando al convertirse en el escenario de pugna de las potencias debido al servilismo a grandes potencias y actos vendepatrias.
					
					Los pobres titeres surcoreanos viven en la colonia de EE.UU. que les ha arrebatado hasta el mando militar, simbolo principal de un Estado soberano.
					
					Ellos deben aceptar sin ninguna queja hasta la carne de vacas locas, que les tira EE.UU., y si este hace un estornudo, han de sufrir sin falta la fiebre alta cogiendo gripe al igual que su amo gringo.
					
					La situacion del Sur de Corea es tan miserable que hasta la "presidenta" Park debe hablar no en su lengua materna sino en ingles y actuar con coqueteria cuando visita a EE.UU. para ser abrazada por este como perra mimada y lacaya fiel. 
					
					Por eso, hemos definido hace mucho tiempo al Sur de Corea como colectivo de titeres que no tienen espiritu ni cara propia y como horda de sirvientes coloniales habituados al servilismo a grandes potencias y a los actos vendepatrias. 
					
					No podemos tolerar jamas que tales tipejos se hayan atrevido a calumniar a la RPDC, pais mas digno del mundo.
					
					Que pobres son los titeres surcoreanos que fanfarronean depositando la esperanza en los irrisorios pertrechos militares de su amo gringo tales como el avion de asalto, el portaaviones y bombas teledirigidas!
					
					Nuestro ejercito no oculta que tiene los medios de ataque mas poderosos que todos los armamentos sofisticados de que los norteamericanos hacen mucha propaganda.
					
					Hemos tomado ya la decision de hacerles probar el golpe duro de esos medios cuando se de la oportunidad.
					
					Consideramos especialmente grave el hecho de que inconscientes de esa realidad, esos tipejos chismearon sin vacilacion alguna que la RPDC es el "pais que debe ser eliminado cuanto antes".
					
					En la historia de division nacional de muchas vicisitudes, nunca se ha escuchado antes tal disparate.
					
					La presente chismografia de los compinches de Park es la negativa total a la parte connacional y la declaracion abierta de su ambicion de lograr la "unificacion mediante la absorcion de regimenes" y de enfrentamiento total de regimenes.
					
					No se puede remediar ni reparar las consecuencias que se produzcan de tal disparate.
					
					Todos los uniformados y civiles de la RPDC y los compatriotas demandan fuertemente barrer de este territorio a la horda de Park que cometio sin titubeo el peor crimen de traicion.
					
					Los compinches de Park experimentaran en carne propia las horrorosas consecuencias de su chismografia.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a compinches de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a compinches de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica hoy una declaracion condenando los chismes anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Kim Min Sok, vocero del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea.
					El dia 12, en la rueda de prensa ordinaria, Kim volvio a cuestionar atrevidamente el "incidente de drones del Norte", inventado por ellos mismos, y hasta censuro la sagrada soberania estatal de la RPDC, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Tal censura de Kim no pasa de ser un esfuerzo desesperado de la horda de Park para liberarse de la crisis inminente.
					
					Ahora, los compinches de Park se hallan en extremado aprieto irrecuperable debido al caso de hundimiento de barco surcoreano de pasajeros y otros accidentes.
					
					Tan inquietados, Park y sus lacayos actuan con frenesi para liberarse de la situacion muy desesperada. Parece que ellos desaten la  guerra contra la RPDC, lo cual deviene una estupidez al igual que meterse en la boca de lobo.
					
					Hasta EE.UU., autodenominado como unica superpotencia, no se atreve a atacar a la RPDC aunque la considera como espina en su garganta. Pero, un grupo de cobardes dirigidos por Park trata de atentar la RPDC, lo que causa solo las risas burlonas.
					
					Esta vez, Kim Min Sok chismeo que la "RPDC debe ser eliminada".
					
					Pero, esta claro cuales son el "pais" y el "gobierno" a ser desaparecidos en este mundo al comparar la situacion del Sur de Corea que se hunde en el infierno por el repudio de las opiniones publicas, y el aspecto maravilloso de la RPDC que avanza con firmeza hacia un mundo ideal donde todo el pueblo goza a sus anchas de la opulencia socialista.
					
					Hay que darse clara cuenta de que "Chongwadae" y el regimen colonial del Sur de Corea son los que deben ser eliminados por rafagas de fuego.
					
					Para mantener el resto de su vida, Park debe castigar severamente a Kim y sus manipuladores que se atrevieron a difamar la RPDC.
					
					En el caso contrario, el Ministerio titere de Defensa Nacional y hasta la "Chongwadae" no podran estar a salvo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador turco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del embajador turco
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Arslan Hakan OKCAL presento el dia 13 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Turquia en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el representante diplomatico.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan albergue de Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y el Estado visitan albergue de Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros del Partido y el Estado, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, organizaciones de trabajadores, ministerios y organos centrales visitaron el dia 13 el albergue de obreras de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang.
					Los visitantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar los ramos de flores ante el mural de mosaico con sus imagenes.
					
					Ellos escucharon la explicacion de que el albergue fue construido magnificamente conforme a la estetica contemporanea y la demanda de la epoca.
					
					Y recorrieron varios puntos del albergue transformado como palacio para las trabajadoras comunes en el principio de dar prioridad a la comodidad y a la estetica.
					
					Se quedaron admirados de los dormitorios, bano publico, comedor, biblioteca, tienda, parque y otros lugares del albergue.

articles.title: Federacion de Discapacitados de China dona materiales de cooperacion
articles.content:
Federacion de Discapacitados de China dona materiales de cooperacion
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Federacion de Discapacitados de China dono los materiales de cooperacion a la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en esta capital la ceremonia de donacion.
					
					Estuvieron presentes aqui el vicepresidente del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea, Kim Mun Chol, los funcionarios interesados y los miembros de la delegacion de la Federacion de Discapacitados de China, encabezada por su vicepresidente, Cheng Kai, de visita en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					Tras la ceremonia, los participantes presenciaron una funcion de los miembros del grupo artistico de discapacitados.
